net.jforum.entities

Class Category

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jforum.entities.Category
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Category
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents a category in the System. Each category holds a reference to all its forums, which can be retrieved by calling either @link #getForums(),
    Author:
    Rafael Steil
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • reloadForum

        public void reloadForum(Forum forum)
        Reloads a forum. The forum should already be in the cache and SHOULD NOT have its order changed. If the forum's order was changed, then you MUST CALL @link #changeForumOrder(Forum) BEFORE calling this method.
        Parameters:
        forum - The forum to reload its information
        See Also:
        changeForumOrder(Forum)

      • changeForumOrder

        public void changeForumOrder(Forum forum)
        Changes a forum's display order. This method changes the position of the forum in the current display order of the forum instance passed as argument, if applicable.
        Parameters:
        forum - The forum to change

      • removeForum

        public void removeForum(int forumId)
        Removes a forum from the list.
        Parameters:
        forumId - int

      • getForum

        public Forum getForum(int userId,
             int forumId)
        Gets a forum.
        Parameters:
        userId - The user's id who is trying to see the forum
        forumId - The id of the forum to get
        Returns:
        The Forum instance if found, or null otherwhise.
        See Also:
        getForum(int)

      • getForum

        public Forum getForum(int forumId)
        Gets a forum.
        Parameters:
        forumId - The forum's id
        Returns:
        The requested forum, if found, or null if the forum does not exists or access to it is denied.
        See Also:
        getForum(int, int)

      • getForums

        public Collection getForums()
        Get all forums from this category.
        Returns:
        All forums, regardless it is accessible to the user or not.

      • getForums

        public Collection getForums(int userId)
        Gets all forums from this category.
        Parameters:
        userId - int
        Returns:
        The forums available to the user who make the call
